sources.title: Scared Stiff
sources.description: Title: Scared Stiff Summary: The jumpy chess editor at a newspaper accidentally gets involved in some murders at a sleazy tavern run by a pair of bizarre brothers. Directed by: Frank McDonald Actors: Jack Haley, Ann Savage, Barton MacLane Production Company: Pine-Thomas Productions Release Date: 22 June 1945 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 The jumpy chess editor at a newspaper accidentally gets involved in some murders at a sleazy tavern run by a pair of bizarre brothers.

sources.title: Scared Stiff (1945)
sources.description: A meek reporter happens upon a murder, an escaped gangster and a stolen jade chess set. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/scared-stiff-1945/

sources.title: Scared Stiff (Treasure of Fear)
sources.description: Jack Haley (the Tin Man of Oz) in a low-budget comedy. He's a chess-columnist who gets mixed up with hoodlums.

metadata.Plot: The jumpy chess editor at a newspaper accidentally gets involved in some murders at a sleazy tavern run by a pair of bizarre brothers.
metadata.Actors: Jack Haley, Ann Savage, Barton MacLane
